summary: Professor Bernard Quatermass' manned rocket ship returns to Earth, but two of the astronauts are missing and the survivor seems ill and unable to communicate.
cast: Brian Donlevy|Jack Warner|Margia Dean|Thora Hird|Gordon Jackson|David King-Wood|Harold Lang|Lionel Jeffries|Sam Kydd|Richard Wordsworth|Jane Aird|Margaret Anderson|Jane Asher|Harry Brunning|Ken Buckle|Eric Corrie|Edward Dane|Gron Davies|Basil Dignam|James Drake|Mabel Etherington|Molly Glessing|Michael Godfrey|Donald Gray|Arthur Gross|Ernest Hare|Lindsay Hooper|Betty Impey|Fred Johnson|Maurice Kaufmann|John Kerr|Henry B. Longhurst|Arthur Lovegrove|Barry Lowe|Mayne Lynton|Frank Maher|Bartlett Mullins|Joe Phelps|Frank Phillips|Paul Phillips|Charles Price|George Roderick|Guy Standeven|John Stirling|Marianne Stone|John Timberlake|Toke Townley|Stanley Van Beers|John Wynn
title: El experimento del Dr. Quatermass
